Package ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core.refactorings

package ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core.refactorings
Contains build-in refactorings.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core
    The main entry package to Neo4j-Migrations.
    ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core.catalog
    Contains the infrastructure for supporting XML based catalogs of migrations.
  • Class
    Description
    AddSurrogateKey
    This refactoring adds a surrogate key, either to all nodes matching one or more labels or to all relationships matching a given type.
    Counters
    Represents the available changes to the Graph done by a refactoring.
    Counters.Empty
    An empty instance.
    CustomizableRefactoring<T extends CustomizableRefactoring<T>>
    A customizable refactoring.
    ListToVector
    This refactoring allows converting vector properties that have been created with either db.create.setNodeVectorProperty or db.create.setRelationshipVectorPropert to the new actual vector property type available in Neo4j 2025.10.
    ListToVector.ElementType
    Support inner vector types.
    Merge
    Refactoring that allows merging of entities.
    Merge.PropertyMergePolicy
    A property merge policy defines how properties with the same name defined on several nodes to be merged should be handled.
    Merge.PropertyMergePolicy.Strategy
    The strategy how to deal with multiple properties of the same name.
    MigrateBTreeIndexes
    Migrates existing B-tree indexes and constraints backed by such indexes to Neo4j 5.0+ and higher supported indexes.
    Normalize
    Normalizes Graph properties.
    QueryRunner
    A simplification over a standard .
    QueryRunner.FeatureSet
    Defines a feature set for any newly opened query runner.
    Refactoring
    Executable definition of a refactoring.
    RefactoringContext
    A wrapper around access to a Neo4j database.
    Rename
    Renames entities or properties of entities.
